alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:39PM CDT until May 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DENTON...SOUTHWESTERN COLLIN AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 638 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plano, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plano, Garland, McKinney, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Allen, Rowlett, Wylie, The Colony, Sachse, Addison, Murphy, Fairview, Lucas, Parker, Hebron, St. Paul and Lewisville Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
